metadata.title: HoloPark Founder's Token
metadata.name: HPFT
metadata.description: The HoloPark is poised to become the world leader in haptic, fully immersive virtual reality gaming experiences. This limited edition Founder's Token entitles the bearer to all the rights, privileges, and benefits as defined by the HoloPark's Founder's Charter. Only 40 of these unique tokens will ever be minted - one for each member seat on the HoloPark Founder's Council.
